#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int comp(int n)
{
	int phi=n,i=2;
	for(i=2;i*i<=n;i++)
		if(n%i == 0)
		{
			while(n%i == 0)
				n /= i;
			phi *= i-1;
			phi /= i;
		}
	if(n != 1){
		phi *= n -1;
		phi /= n;
	}
	return phi;
}
int main()
{
	int t,n;
	cin>>t;
	while((t--)>0)
		cin>>n,cout<<comp(n)<<endl;
	return 0;
}
